author: Jenna Romaine
title: Vast 112-Track 'Bob's Burgers' Compilation Album Announced
text:
Courtesy of Fox Bob's Burgers 
FOX’s animated hit show Bob’s Burgers has announced an upcoming compilation album that has fans teeming with excitement. 
With an unbelievable 112 tracks spanning the animated comedy’s seven seasons, the album is to be released May 12 through Sub Pop. 
Bob’s Burgers has held numerous appearances from musicians over its six years on air, all slated to be featured on the record, such as indie rockers St. Vincent (“Bad Girls”), and The National ( “Bad Stuff Happens in the Bathroom”) among others. 
The vast compilation also includes a few shorts from cast members and guest stars like Kristen Schaal, H. Jon Benjamin, Aziz Ansari , Sarah Silverman and more. 
To pre-order the album and view the full track list click here . 
Watch St. Vincent’s featured track in the video below.
